name: skadivm
description: A tool for running virtual machines on Android.

scripts.build:qemu:_: Builds Qemu for supported target architectures, ie the devices our app will run on, NOT the emulated architectures. Those are set in Dockerfile.qemu.
scripts.build:qemu:dobuild: npx -p cross-env cross-env-shell docker build --tag skadivm-qemu-builder-$ANDROID_ARCH --build-arg AndroidCPUArch=$ANDROID_ARCH --file ./scripts/Dockerfile.qemu --platform $DOCKER_PLATFORM . && npx -p cross-env cross-env-shell docker run --rm --platform $DOCKER_PLATFORM --mount type=bind,source=.,target=/project skadivm-qemu-builder-$ANDROID_ARCH
scripts.build:qemu:x86_64: npx -p cross-env cross-env-shell ANDROID_ARCH=x86_64 DOCKER_PLATFORM="linux/amd64" npm run build:qemu:dobuild
scripts.build:qemu:arm64: npx -p cross-env cross-env-shell ANDROID_ARCH=arm64-v8a DOCKER_PLATFORM="linux/arm64" npm run build:qemu:dobuild
scripts.build:qemu: npm run build:qemu:x86_64 && npm run build:qemu:arm64

author: jjv360
